lore.text: Gain an Adreline Rush when you drop to
6, 4, and 2 Hearts, granting various
bonus effects for 5 seconds. You cannot
gain the same effect again until you
return to your spawn.
Gain 3 random items. Once you have
acquired a stack of 2 of them, receive a
reward!
At the start of the game and whenever
your team kills a Titan, gain a Titan
Spinal Fluid, which transforms you into
a colossal Titan for 30 seconds.
Summon a Pack Leader, a large wolf with
increased HP and damage. Whenever you
recall or respawn, summon a Pack Leader
if you don’t already have one.
Gain a Power III Bow and 64 arrows. Your
arrow limit is increased to 64.
Whenever you mine an ore, there is a
chance it drops rare loot!
Gain a Buzzburst and 3 Royal Jelly.
Whenever you are standing on Honey
blocks, gain Regeneration I.
Increase your max HP by 10 hearts. You
are permanently glowing.
Gain a Hard Drive, a Diamond Chestplate.
Download an upgrade for it now and every
7 minutes. (select from 3 options each
time)
Gain every Diamond Tool, Weapon, and
Armor. They all gain random
enchantments.
Gain a Totem of Undying. Each time you
respawn (after 15 minutes), gain
another.
Any enemy you hit with a crossbow glows
and takes 20% increased damage from all
sources for 15 seconds. Gain a Piercing
I, Quick Charge II crossbow and 32
arrows. Your arrow limit is increased to
Gain 10 minutes of Speed I and Boots of
Swiftness, which grant 15% increased
movement speed.
Golden Apples heal you for 4 hearts
instead of 2. Gain 3 Golden Apples.
You no longer heal from Golden Apples.
Gain 6 max HP and bonuses based on your
missing health.
Gain a Gomu Gomu Fruit, an item that
makes you HUGE when held.
When you kill a hostile mob, it has a
100% chance to drop a Golden Apple.
Gain 15 Diamonds. Every 2 minutes, gain
1 additional Diamond of interest for
every 10 Diamonds in your inventory.
Gain +2 Attack Damage and 15% movement
speed whenever your hunger bar isn't
full. Gain permanent Hunger II.
Gain rewards for killing certain numbers
of hostile mobs: 5 Zombies - Gain 4 max
Hearts 5 Skeletons - Gain a Power III
Bow and 8 arrows 5 Creepers - For the
rest of the game, explode on death 5
Spiders - Gain a Web-o-Rang
Gain Kalyx's Thorns and Bone Cage, a
special Helmet and Chestplate with bonus
effects.
Gain a Netherite Pickaxe with Efficiency
I and Fortune II.
Become very small (0.8x size).
Your attacks on enemy players have a 10%
chance of summoning a falling meteor
from the sky that explodes on impact.
Gain permanent Fire Resistance.
All ores you touch are turned into Gold.
Gain Midas Pickaxe and Midas Armor
(equivalent to Diamond Pickaxe/Armor).
At the start of the game and every
minute, the items in your Ender Chest
are completely randomized. Gain an Ender
Chest and Pandora's Pickaxe, a special
Pickaxe that can only break Ender
Chests.
Gain 5 max Hearts. You have Regeneration
I whenever you haven't taken damage for
7 seconds.
A ghostly Diamond sword hovers above
you. After you attack, the sword has a
50% chance to strike your target.
Gain a random Radiant Relic.
Whenever you or an ally within 32 blocks
dies, summon a Zombie with the same
armor as the deceased.
Gain permanent Resistance I. You can no
longer hold Shields.
Gain full diamond tools with Efficiency
IV, 64 Oak Logs, 4 Golden Apples, 3 Soul
Shards, and 10 Books.
Gain Boots of Swiftness and permanent
Jump Boost 2. (Boots of Swiftness grant
15% increased movement speed)
Gain a Turtle's Shell, a powerful
chestplate that grants 10 maximum health
but reduces your movement speed.
Gain Haste LXXV (break almost all blocks
instantly) and Speed III for 10 minutes.
Killing a rare mob for the first time
grants unique rewards. A rare mob you
haven't killed yet spawns near you every
3 minutes for the first 12 minutes.
Gain Speed II whenever you aren't
wearing boots.
Gain a Ravager Spawn Egg every 10
minutes. The Ravagers have 30% increased
Health, Speed, and Damage.
Gain a Luck of the Sea X Lure V Fishing
rod.
Gain a Portal Gate, which returns 4
minutes after use. After opening a
portal, gain speed I for 1 minute.
